org.finra.herd.service.impl

Class BusinessObjectFormatServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.finra.herd.service.impl.BusinessObjectFormatServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BusinessObjectFormatService

    @Service
 @Transactional(value="herdTransactionManager")
public class BusinessObjectFormatServiceImpl
extends Object
implements BusinessObjectFormatService
    The business object format service implementation.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Set<String> SCHEMA_COLUMN_DATA_TYPES_WITH_ALLOWED_SIZE_INCREASE
      List all schema column data types for which size increase is considered to be an additive schema change.

        skipRequestValidation - specifies whether to skip the request validation and trimming
        Returns:
        the business object format DDL information
